property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the HTMLExportPreference (a Document).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: exportSelection
property.shortdesc: If true and have selection, export selected content to HTML.

property.name: exportOrder
property.shortdesc: The export order.

property.name: bulletExportOption
property.shortdesc: The bullet export option.

property.name: numberedListExportOption
property.shortdesc: The numbered list export option.

property.name: viewDocumentAfterExport
property.shortdesc: If true, open docuemnt in viewer after export.

property.name: imageExportOption
property.shortdesc: The export order.

property.name: imageExportResolution
property.shortdesc: The export resolution

property.name: customImageSizeOption
property.shortdesc: Allows user to select the image size option for conversion

property.name: preserveLayoutAppearence
property.shortdesc: If true, format image based on layout appearence.

property.name: imageAlignment
property.shortdesc: Alignment applied to images

property.name: imageSpaceBefore
property.shortdesc: Space Before applied to images

property.name: imageSpaceAfter
property.shortdesc: Space After applied to images

property.name: applyImageAlignmentToAnchoredObjectSettings
property.shortdesc: apply image alignment to anchored object settings.

property.name: imageConversion
property.shortdesc: The file format to use for converted images. Note: Valid only when copy optimized images and/or copy formatted images is true.

property.name: gifOptionsPalette
property.shortdesc: The color palette for GIF conversion. Note: Not valid when image conversion is JPEG.

property.name: gifOptionsInterlaced
property.shortdesc: If true, generates interlaced GIFs. Note: Not valid  when image conversion is JPEG.

property.name: jpegOptionsQuality
property.shortdesc: The quality of converted JPEG images. Note: Not valid when image conversion is GIF.

property.name: jpegOptionsFormat
property.shortdesc: The formatting method for converted JPEG images. Note: Not valid  when image conversion is GIF.

property.name: level
property.shortdesc: The PNG compression level.

property.name: ignoreObjectConversionSettings
property.shortdesc: ignore object level image conversion settings.

property.name: serverPath
property.shortdesc: The server path for image .

property.name: imageExtension
property.shortdesc: The image extension on server.

property.name: preserveLocalOverride
property.shortdesc: If true, output local style override.

property.name: externalStyleSheets
property.shortdesc: The file path of external cascading style sheets.

property.name: javascripts
property.shortdesc: The file path of external javascripts.

property.name: generateCascadeStyleSheet
property.shortdesc: If true, InDesign will generate cascade style sheet.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the HTMLExportPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
